title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 371 - Identification and Listing of Hazardous Wastes

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, art. 1, title 1, art. 3, title 3, §§ 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0304, 19-0306, 23- 2305, 23-2307, 23-2308, art. 27, §§ 27-0105, 27-0106, 27-0305, 27-0905, titles 1, 3, 7, 9, §§ 70-0107, 70-0109, 70-0115, art. 71, § 71-2201, titles 27, 35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
